mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM (SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(COMMENT_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') COMMENT_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_VIDEO_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, PARENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT_LIKE L WHERE VC.COMMENT_NO = L.COMMENT_NO) LIKE_COUNT_COMMENT FROM "VIDEO_COMMENT" VC JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_VIDEO_NO = #{boardVideoNo}) C WHERE COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "VIDEO_COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.PARENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') START WITH PARENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_NO = PARENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_NO
